text: The British Columbia Hockey League is a Junior "A" ice hockey league from British Columbia under Hockey Canada, a subsection of the Canadian Junior Hockey League. ==Member teams== Division Team City Arena Island Division Alberni Valley Bulldogs Port Alberni, British Columbia Weyerhauser Arena Cowichan Valley Capitals Duncan, British Columbia Island Savings Centre Nanaimo Clippers Nanaimo, British Columbia Frank Crane Arena Victoria Grizzlies Victoria, British Columbia The Q Center Powell River Kings Powell River, British Columbia Hap Parker Arena Mainland Division Chilliwack Chiefs Chilliwack, British Columbia Prospera Centre Coquitlam Express Coquitlam, British Columbia Poirier Sport & Leisure Complex Langley Rivermen Langley, British Columbia Langley Events Centre Prince George Spruce Kings Prince George, British Columbia Prince George Coliseum Surrey Eagles Surrey, British Columbia South Surrey Arena Interior Division Merritt Centennials Merritt, British Columbia Nicola Valley Memorial Arena Penticton Vees Penticton, British Columbia South Okanagan Events Centre Salmon Arm Silverbacks Salmon Arm, British Columbia Shaw Centre Trail Smoke Eaters Trail, British Columbia Cominco Arena Vernon Vipers Vernon, British Columbia Kal Tire Place West Kelowna Warriors West Kelowna, British Columbia Royal LePage Place ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Ice hockey leagues in Canada
title: British Columbia Hockey League
